CustomField.description: If set, it overrides the Group to which the Timecard Header 's Cost Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if its Project or Resource are in a different Group. Note that either way, the Cost Transactions will continue to roll up to the same Project's Project Actuals and same Resource's Resource Actuals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set, it overrides the Group to which the Timecard Header 's Cost Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if its Project or Resource are in a different Group.
CustomField.label: Override Cost Group
